item.description:
Daphne Kalotay, who has taught at BU as well as at Middlebury and Skidmore, is the author of Calamity and Other Stories and of Russian Winter.

Sassan Tabatabai, who teaches at Boston College and at BU, is the author of the author of Father of Songs: Rudaki and his Poetry, and Uzunburun (published by Pen & Anvil Press, the publishing initiative association with the Boston Poetry Union and this Meetup group.) Find out more about his work at http://penandanvil.com/tabatabai.

Discussion and refreshments will follow the reading.

This event is a local meeting of the Association of Literary Scholars, Critics, and Writers; those who are not members of the Association are likewise welcome. For more information about the ALSCW, visit http://alscw.org.

RSVP to office@alscw.org.
item.name: Reading: Kalotay and Tabatabai
